mapper.select:
select lodgingId, lodgingName, b.leaseName, a.leaseId, c.cateName, a.cateCode, lodgingPrice from reserve_lodging a left outer join reserve_lease b on a.leaseId = b.leaseId left outer join reserve_bcate c on a.cateCode = c.cateCode
order by lodgingId desc limit #{skip}, #{amount}
select leaseId from reserve_lease where leaseName like concat ('%', #{keyword}, '%')
select * from reserve_bcate where cateCode > 100 and cateCode < 200
select * from reserve_bcate where cateCode > 200 and cateCode < 300

select a.LodgingId, a.LodgingName, a.LeaseId, b.LeaseName, a.CATECODE, c.CATENAME, a.LodgingPrice, a.LodgingStock, a.LodgingIntro, a.LodgingContents from reserve_lodging a left outer join reserve_lease b on a.leaseId = b.leaseId left outer join reserve_bcate c on a.catecode = c.catecode where lodgingId = ${lodgingId}
